name: 只因兄弟(BroChicken)
description:
In the world of BroChicken, there are all kinds of precious treasures. Brave explorers from all over the world have embarked on a treasure hunt journey. However, the more precious the treasures, the more dangerous places to find them, and only the bravest and most powerful explorers can get them.

Game Features:

1. The 3D picture based on Unreal Engine makes the visual experience more cool
2. The pace is fast, 20 rounds, and the total duration does not exceed half an hour
3. Dozens of characters and weapons, hundreds of props, let you mix and match your own gameplay
4. Super weapon synthesis system: the cool and powerful super weapons help you defeat the enemy more easily, and make your combat experience more cool
5. Customized difficulty option: you can find the most suitable difficulty for you to start your treasure hunting journey
